hindi.question: प्रश्न 1: भारत का राष्ट्रीय पशु कौन सा है?
hindi.hint: यह जंगली जानवर अफ्रीका में भी पाया जाता है।

hindi.question: प्रश्न 2: महात्मा गांधी का पूरा नाम क्या था?

english.question: Question 1: What is the capital of France?

web_development.question: What does HTML stand for?
web_development.answer: Hyper Text Markup Language
web_development.hint: It is the standard markup language for creating web pages.

web_development.question: Which programming language is primarily used for styling web pages?
web_development.answer: CSS
web_development.hint: It stands for Cascading Style Sheets.

web_development.question: What does CSS stand for?
web_development.answer: Cascading Style Sheet
web_development.hint: It defines how HTML elements are to be displayed.

web_development.question: Which HTML tag is used to define an unordered list?
web_development.answer: <ul>
web_development.hint: It is used to create a bulleted list.

web_development.question: What is the correct way to comment in HTML?
web_development.answer: <!-- This is a comment -->
web_development.hint: It is a way to add notes to HTML code that will not be displayed in the web page.

web_development.question: Which symbol is used to access an ID in CSS?
web_development.hint: It is followed by the ID name.

web_development.question: What does HTTP stand for?
web_development.answer: Hyper Text Transfer Protocol
web_development.hint: It is the protocol used for transmitting data over the World Wide Web.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of a CSS reset?
options: To clear all the default browser styling
web_development.answer: To clear all the default browser styling
web_development.hint: It is used to reduce browser inconsistencies.

web_development.question: What is the correct way to include an external CSS file in an HTML document?
web_development.answer: <link rel='stylesheet' href='styles.css'>
web_development.hint: It is placed in the <head> section of the HTML document.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'title' attribute in an HTML <a> tag?
options: To provide extra information about the link
web_development.answer: To provide extra information about the link
web_development.hint: It is displayed as a tooltip when the mouse is placed over the link.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'target' attribute in an HTML <a> tag?
options: To specify where to open the linked document
web_development.answer: To specify where to open the linked document
web_development.hint: It determines the browser context in which the linked document will open.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'alt' attribute in an HTML tag?
options: To provide alternative text for an image
web_development.answer: To provide alternative text for an image
web_development.hint: It is used for accessibility purposes.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of a 'meta' tag in HTML?
options: To define metadata about an HTML document
To link to an external stylesheet
web_development.answer: To define metadata about an HTML document
web_development.hint: It includes metadata such as author, keywords, and character set.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'href' attribute in an HTML <a> tag?
options: To specify where to open the linked document
web_development.answer: To specify the destination URL
web_development.hint: It contains the URL of the page the link goes to.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'src' attribute in an HTML <script> tag?
web_development.answer: Script source
web_development.hint: It specifies the URL of the external script file.

web_development.question: What is the correct way to define a function in JavaScript?
web_development.answer: function myFunction()
web_development.hint: It starts with the 'function' keyword followed by the function name.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'type' attribute in an HTML <script> tag?
web_development.answer: To specify the script type
web_development.hint: It indicates the MIME type of the script.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'scope' attribute in an HTML <th> tag?
options: To specify the table header cell content
To specify the table cell content
To specify the scope of a header cell
web_development.answer: To specify the scope of a header cell
web_development.hint: It defines the set of data cells for which the header cell provides header information.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'title' attribute in an HTML tag?
options: To provide alternative text for an image
web_development.answer: To provide alternative text for an image
web_development.hint: It is displayed as a tooltip when the image cannot be displayed.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'for' attribute in an HTML <label> tag?
options: To specify the ID of the element the label is for
web_development.answer: To specify the ID of the element the label is for
web_development.hint: It associates the label with a form control.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'id' attribute in HTML?
options: To specify a unique identifier for an element
To specify a class for an element
To specify inline styles for an element
web_development.answer: To specify a unique identifier for an element
web_development.hint: It must be unique within the HTML document.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'class' attribute in HTML?
options: To specify a unique identifier for an element
To specify a class for an element
To specify inline styles for an element
web_development.answer: To specify a class for an element
web_development.hint: It can be used to apply CSS styles to multiple elements.

web_development.question: What does JSON stand for?
web_development.answer: JavaScript Object Notation
web_development.hint: It is a lightweight data interchange format.

web_development.question: What is the correct way to define a variable in JavaScript?
web_development.answer: var myVar = 10;
web_development.hint: It starts with the 'var' keyword followed by the variable name.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'placeholder' attribute in an HTML <input> tag?
options: To provide a hint to the user about the expected value of the input field
web_development.answer: To provide a hint to the user about the expected value of the input field
web_development.hint: It is displayed in the input field before the user enters a value.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'disabled' attribute in an HTML <input> tag?
web_development.answer: To disable the input field
web_development.hint: It prevents the user from interacting with the input field.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'required' attribute in an HTML <input> tag?
options: To require the input field to be filled out before submitting the form
web_development.answer: To require the input field to be filled out before submitting the form
web_development.hint: It specifies that the input field must be filled out before submitting the form.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'autocomplete' attribute in an HTML <input> tag?
options: To enable or disable autocomplete for an input field
web_development.answer: To enable or disable autocomplete for an input field
web_development.hint: It controls whether the browser should automatically complete the input value based on the user's input history.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'maxlength' attribute in an HTML <input> tag?
options: To specify the maximum value of the input field
To specify the maximum number of characters allowed in the input field
web_development.answer: To specify the maximum number of characters allowed in the input field
web_development.hint: It limits the number of characters the user can input into the field.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'minlength' attribute in an HTML <input> tag?
options: To specify the minimum value of the input field
To specify the minimum number of characters required in the input field
web_development.answer: To specify the minimum number of characters required in the input field
web_development.hint: It specifies the minimum number of characters the user must input into the field.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'pattern' attribute in an HTML <input> tag?
options: To specify a regular expression pattern the input value must match
web_development.answer: To specify a regular expression pattern the input value must match
web_development.hint: It is used for form validation.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'autofocus' attribute in an HTML <input> tag?
options: To automatically focus the input field when the page loads
web_development.answer: To automatically focus the input field when the page loads
web_development.hint: It specifies that the input field should automatically have focus when the page loads.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'multiple' attribute in an HTML <select> tag?
options: To allow multiple selections in a dropdown list
web_development.answer: To allow multiple selections in a dropdown list
web_development.hint: It enables the selection of multiple options in a dropdown list.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'readonly' attribute in an HTML <input> tag?
options: To make the input field read-only
web_development.answer: To make the input field read-only
web_development.hint: It prevents the user from editing the input value.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'autocomplete' attribute in an HTML <form> tag?
options: To enable or disable autocomplete for all input fields within the form
web_development.answer: To enable or disable autocomplete for all input fields within the form
web_development.hint: It controls autocomplete behavior for all input fields within the form.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'enctype' attribute in an HTML <form> tag?
options: To specify the character encoding used to submit the form data
web_development.answer: To specify the character encoding used to submit the form data
web_development.hint: It determines how form data should be encoded before it is sent to the server.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'method' attribute in an HTML <form> tag?
options: To specify the HTTP method used to submit the form data
web_development.answer: To specify the HTTP method used to submit the form data
web_development.hint: It specifies the HTTP method used when submitting the form.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'target' attribute in an HTML <form> tag?
options: To specify where to display the response received after submitting the form
web_development.answer: To specify where to display the response received after submitting the form
web_development.hint: It specifies the name of the window or frame where the response should be displayed.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'novalidate' attribute in an HTML <form> tag?
web_development.answer: To disable form validation
web_development.hint: It prevents browser validation of form elements.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'async' attribute in an HTML <script> tag?
options: To specify whether the script should be executed asynchronously
web_development.answer: To specify whether the script should be executed asynchronously
web_development.hint: It allows the script to be downloaded asynchronously while the HTML document is parsed.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'defer' attribute in an HTML <script> tag?
options: To specify whether the script execution should be deferred until after the HTML document is parsed
web_development.answer: To specify whether the script execution should be deferred until after the HTML document is parsed
web_development.hint: It delays script execution until after the document has been parsed.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'rel' attribute in an HTML <link> tag?
options: To specify the relationship between the current document and the linked document
To specify where to open the linked document
web_development.answer: To specify the relationship between the current document and the linked document
web_development.hint: It defines the relationship between the current document and the linked document.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'preload' attribute in an HTML <audio> tag?
options: To specify whether the audio should be preloaded
web_development.answer: To specify whether the audio should be preloaded
web_development.hint: It specifies that the audio should be loaded when the page loads.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'controls' attribute in an HTML <video> tag?
options: To specify whether playback controls should be displayed for the video
web_development.answer: To specify whether playback controls should be displayed for the video
web_development.hint: It adds playback controls (such as play, pause, and volume) to the video.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'sandbox' attribute in an HTML <iframe> tag?
options: To restrict what the embedded content can do
web_development.answer: To restrict what the embedded content can do
web_development.hint: It creates an isolated environment for the embedded content.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'scrolling' attribute in an HTML <iframe> tag?
options: To specify whether scrollbars should be displayed for the iframe
web_development.answer: To specify whether scrollbars should be displayed for the iframe
web_development.hint: It controls whether scrollbars should be displayed for the iframe.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'charset' attribute in an HTML <meta> tag?
options: To specify the character encoding used for the document
web_development.answer: To specify the character encoding used for the document
web_development.hint: It specifies the character encoding used for the document.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'content' attribute in an HTML <meta> tag?
options: To specify the character encoding used for the document
web_development.answer: To specify metadata content
web_development.hint: It provides metadata content for the document.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'download' attribute in an HTML <a> tag?
options: To prompt the user to download the linked file
web_development.answer: To prompt the user to download the linked file
web_development.hint: It forces the browser to download the linked file instead of navigating to it.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'hreflang' attribute in an HTML <a> tag?
options: To specify the language of the linked document
web_development.answer: To specify the language of the linked document
web_development.hint: It specifies the language of the linked document.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'media' attribute in an HTML <link> tag?
options: To specify the media type or media query for the linked document
web_development.answer: To specify the media type or media query for the linked document
web_development.hint: It specifies the media type or media query for the linked document.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'sizes' attribute in an HTML <link> tag?
options: To specify the sizes of the icons for the linked document
web_development.answer: To specify the sizes of the icons for the linked document
web_development.hint: It specifies the sizes of the icons for the linked document.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'srcset' attribute in an HTML tag?
options: To specify multiple image sources for responsive images
web_development.answer: To specify multiple image sources for responsive images
web_development.hint: It provides multiple sources for the browser to choose from, based on device pixel density.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'usemap' attribute in an HTML tag?
options: To specify a client-side image map to use for the image
web_development.answer: To specify a client-side image map to use for the image
web_development.hint: It associates an image with a client-side image map.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'async' attribute in an HTML <iframe> tag?
options: To specify whether the iframe content should be loaded asynchronously
web_development.answer: To specify whether the iframe content should be loaded asynchronously
web_development.hint: It indicates whether the iframe content should be loaded asynchronously.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'height' attribute in an HTML <iframe> tag?
web_development.answer: To specify the iframe height
web_development.hint: It specifies the height of the iframe.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'referrerpolicy' attribute in an HTML <iframe> tag?
options: To specify the policy for sending the Referer header
web_development.answer: To specify the policy for sending the Referer header
web_development.hint: It controls how much information should be included in the Referer header when the user navigates to another page.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'sandbox' attribute in an HTML <iframe> tag?
options: To restrict what the embedded content can do
web_development.answer: To restrict what the embedded content can do
web_development.hint: It creates an isolated environment for the embedded content.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'width' attribute in an HTML <iframe> tag?
web_development.answer: To specify the iframe width
web_development.hint: It specifies the width of the iframe.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'scrolling' attribute in an HTML <iframe> tag?
options: To specify whether scrollbars should be displayed for the iframe
web_development.answer: To specify whether scrollbars should be displayed for the iframe
web_development.hint: It controls whether scrollbars should be displayed for the iframe.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'controls' attribute in an HTML <audio> tag?
options: To specify whether playback controls should be displayed for the audio
web_development.answer: To specify whether playback controls should be displayed for the audio
web_development.hint: It adds playback controls (such as play, pause, and volume) to the audio.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'autoplay' attribute in an HTML <audio> tag?
options: To specify whether the audio should start playing automatically
web_development.answer: To specify whether the audio should start playing automatically
web_development.hint: It starts playing the audio automatically when the page loads.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'loop' attribute in an HTML <audio> tag?
options: To specify whether the audio should loop
web_development.answer: To specify whether the audio should loop
web_development.hint: It makes the audio loop continuously when it reaches the end.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'preload' attribute in an HTML <audio> tag?
options: To specify whether the audio should be preloaded
web_development.answer: To specify whether the audio should be preloaded
web_development.hint: It specifies that the audio should be loaded when the page loads.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'poster' attribute in an HTML <video> tag?
options: To specify an image to be shown while the video is downloading
web_development.answer: To specify an image to be shown while the video is downloading
web_development.hint: It provides a placeholder image for the video.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'autoplay' attribute in an HTML <video> tag?
options: To specify whether the video should start playing automatically
web_development.answer: To specify whether the video should start playing automatically
web_development.hint: It starts playing the video automatically when the page loads.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'controls' attribute in an HTML <video> tag?
options: To specify whether playback controls should be displayed for the video
web_development.answer: To specify whether playback controls should be displayed for the video
web_development.hint: It adds playback controls (such as play, pause, and volume) to the video.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'loop' attribute in an HTML <video> tag?
options: To specify whether the video should loop
web_development.answer: To specify whether the video should loop
web_development.hint: It makes the video loop continuously when it reaches the end.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'preload' attribute in an HTML <video> tag?
options: To specify whether the video should be preloaded
web_development.answer: To specify whether the video should be preloaded
web_development.hint: It specifies that the video should be loaded when the page loads.

web_development.question: What is the purpose of the 'controlsList' attribute in an HTML <video> tag?
options: To specify which controls should be displayed for the video
web_development.answer: To specify which controls should be displayed for the video
web_development.hint: It specifies which controls should be displayed for the video.
